card.name: Abandon Hope
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Abandon Hope, discard X cards. Look at target opponent's hand and choose X cards from it. That player discards those cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Gerrard's form vanished into the maw of trees, Hanna mouthed a silent plea, mourning a crushed dream.

card.name: Advance Scout
card.property: First strike {W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The soldier's path is worn smooth by the tread of many feet—all in one direction, none returning." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Aftershock
card.property: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land. Aftershock deals 3 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every act of destruction has a repercussion." —Karn, silver golem

card.name: Altar of Dementia
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Target player puts a number of cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is not that you will go mad. It is that you will beg for madness." —Volrath

card.name: Aluren
card.property: Any player may cast creature spells with converted mana cost 3 or less without paying their mana cost and as though they had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Squee bounced up and down. "I sees a horsey, an' a piggy, an' a—" "If you don't shut up," hissed Mirri, "you'll see a kidney and a spleeny."

card.name: Ancient Runes
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Ancient Runes deals damage to that player equal to the number of artifacts he or she controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ertai volunteered to open the portal. He figured he owed it one.

card.name: Ancient Tomb
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool. Ancient Tomb deals 2 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no glory to be gained in the kingdom of the dead. —Vec tomb inscription

card.name: Angelic Protector
card.property: Flying Whenever Angelic Protector becomes the target of a spell or ability, Angelic Protector gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My family sheltered in her light, the dark was content to wait." —Crovax

card.name: Anoint
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

card.name: Apes of Rath
card.property: Whenever Apes of Rath attacks, it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Apocalypse
card.property: Exile all permanents. You discard your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is a future in which I can see only mist and a single shadow." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Armor Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hanna: "We must learn how they protect each other." Mirri: "After they've done trying to kill us, all right?"

card.name: Armored Pegasus
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I always charge a little extra to take on a pegasus. They fly like eagles, kick like mules, and hide like hermits." —Tahli en-Dal, bounty hunter

card.name: Auratog
card.property: Sacrifice an enchantment: Auratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The auratog enjoys eating its wards.

card.name: Avenging Angel
card.property: Flying When Avenging Angel dies, you may put it on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Barbed Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spans of spines leapt from one sliver to the next, forming a deadly hedge around the Weatherlight.

card.name: Bayou Dragonfly
card.property: Flying; swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Like a sugar stick with wings!" —Squee, goblin cabin hand

card.name: Bellowing Fiend
card.property: Flying Whenever Bellowing Fiend deals damage to a creature, Bellowing Fiend deals 3 damage to that creature's controller and 3 damage to you.

card.name: Benthic Behemoth
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Deep devourer concealed in darkhome Shrouded it seeks all becomes fodder Once we swam alone and asea But no more." —Rootwater Saga

card.name: Blood Frenzy
card.property: Cast Blood Frenzy only before the combat damage step. Target attacking or blocking creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When Torahn bellows, none survive—not even the warrior whose horns he rides." —Talruum adage

card.name: Blood Pet
card.property: Sacrifice Blood Pet: Add {B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You are wrong," Volrath said. "I do not hate the living. They often prove quite useful to me." And then he laughed.

card.name: Boil
card.property: Destroy all Islands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fishers will throw out their nets and draw them back filled with dust." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Booby Trap
card.property: As Booby Trap enters the battlefield, choose an opponent and a card name other than a basic land card name. The chosen player reveals each card he or she draws. When the chosen player draws a card with the chosen name, sacrifice Booby Trap. If you do, Booby Trap deals 10 damage to that player.

card.name: Bottle Gnomes
card.property: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am reminded of the fable of the silver egg. Its owner cracks it open to see what jewels it holds, only to discover a simple yellow yolk." —Karn, silver golem

card.name: Bounty Hunter
card.property: {T}: Put a bounty counter on target nonblack creature. {T}: Destroy target creature with a bounty counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once they've marked you," Starke said, "the world is made of glass."

card.name: Broken Fall
card.property: Return Broken Fall to its owner's hand: Regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I think I used up all my good luck and all my bad luck in the same fall." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Caldera Lake
card.property: Caldera Lake enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool. Caldera Lake deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Canopy Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We know our place in the cycle of life—and it is not as flies." —Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Canyon Drake
card.property: Flying {1}, Discard a card at random: Canyon Drake gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These runes are tough enough without the distraction," Ertai muttered, one eye on the drake.

card.name: Canyon Wildcat
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Relative of yours?" Ertai teased. Mirri simply sneered.

card.name: Capsize
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Carrionette
Chaotic Goo
card.property: Chaotic Goo enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may flip a coin. If you win the flip, put a +1/+1 counter on Chaotic Goo. If you lose the flip, remove a +1/+1 counter from Chaotic Goo.

card.name: Charging Rhino
card.property: Charging Rhino can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is it wrong to go straight for what you want? Sneaking is for cats and goblins." —Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

card.name: Chill
card.property: Red spells cost {2} more to cast.

card.name: Choke
card.property: Islands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One day we shall walk where once was water." —Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Cinder Marsh
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Cinder Marsh doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Black
card.property: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Blue
card.property: {1}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.property: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.property: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Shadow

card.name: Circle of Protection: White
card.property: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Clergy en-Vec
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Faith's shield is hammered out by the blows of unbelievers." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Clot Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "{2}: Regenerate this permanent."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One would think I would be accustomed to unexpected returns." —Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Cloudchaser Eagle
card.property: Flying When Cloudchaser Eagle enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the eagle catches a cloud, it tears it into strips that fall to earth. —Vec myth of the rains

card.name: Coercion
card.property: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's very little that escapes me, Greven. And you will escape very little if you fail." —Volrath

card.name: Coffin Queen
card.property: You may choose not to untap Coffin Queen during your untap step. {2}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. When Coffin Queen becomes untapped or you lose control of Coffin Queen, exile that creature.

card.name: Coiled Tinviper
card.property: First strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bite of the tinviper feels most like a razor drawn across the tongue.

card.name: Cold Storage
card.property: {3}: Exile target creature you control. Sacrifice Cold Storage: Return each creature card exiled with Cold Storage to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Commander Greven il-Vec
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) When Commander Greven il-Vec enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rage is the only freedom left me." —Greven il-Vec

card.name: Corpse Dance
card.property: Buyback {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Return the top creature card of your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Counterspell
card.property: Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was probably a lousy spell in the first place." —Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Crazed Armodon
card.property: {G}: Crazed Armodon gets +3/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. Destroy Crazed Armodon at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These are its last days. Mourning is over. Rage remains.

card.name: Crown of Flames
card.property: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {R}: Return Crown of Flames to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is the forge of kings.

card.name: Cursed Scroll
card.property: {3}, {T}: Choose a card name, then reveal a card at random from your hand. If that card has the chosen name, Cursed Scroll deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Dark Banishing
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is the way of most wizards to begin by exiling themselves and to end by exiling everyone else." —Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Dark Ritual
card.property: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If there is such a thing as too much power, I have not discovered it." —Volrath

card.name: Darkling Stalker
card.property: {B}: Regenerate Darkling Stalker. {B}: Darkling Stalker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In this dark place, yes, I am afraid of my own shadow." —Mirri of the Weatherlight

card.name: Dauthi Embrace
card.property: {B} {B}: Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Dauthi army grows by screams and bounds." —Lyna, Soltari emissary

card.name: Dauthi Ghoul
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Whenever a creature with shadow dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Dauthi Ghoul.

card.name: Dauthi Horror
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Dauthi Horror can't be blocked by white creatures.

card.name: Dauthi Marauder
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Dauthi came from beneath the Ruins one night, and the darkness cast them in the best possible light." —Soltari Tales of Life

card.name: Dauthi Mercenary
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) {1}{B}: Dauthi Mercenary gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Dauthi believe they dignify murder by paying for it." —Lyna, Soltari emissary

card.name: Dauthi Mindripper
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Whenever Dauthi Mindripper attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, defending player discards three cards.

card.name: Dauthi Slayer
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Dauthi Slayer attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They have knives for every soul." —Lyna, Soltari emissary

card.name: Deadshot
card.property: Tap target creature. It deals damage equal to its power to another target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Carrion! Keep your distance. My blade will come to you!" —Crovax

card.name: Death Pits of Rath
card.property: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the sludge below began to shift and take shapes, Gerrard turned from the railing to Orim. "I suppose," he said, "it's a little too late for prayer, isn't it?"

card.name: Diabolic Edict
card.property: Target player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Greven il-Vec lifted Vhati off his feet. "The fall will give you time to think on your failure."

card.name: Dirtcowl Wurm
card.property: Whenever an opponent plays a land, put a +1/+1 counter on Dirtcowl Wurm.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few of Rath's rivers follow a steady course, so many new channels are carved for them.

card.name: Disenchant
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The swarm seemed unmoved by the artificial slivers' destruction. "They clearly were not the leaders," Hanna cursed. "I guess we'll have to do this the hard way."

card.name: Dismiss
card.property: Counter target spell. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is nothing you can do that I cannot simply deny." —Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Disturbed Burial
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Dracoplasm
card.property: Flying As Dracoplasm enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of creatures. Dracoplasm's power becomes the total power of those creatures and its toughness becomes their total toughness. {R}: Dracoplasm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Dread of Night
card.property: White creatures get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These moonless, foreign skies keep me in thrall. Dark whispers echo in the night, and I cannot resist." —Selenia, dark angel

card.name: Dream Cache
card.property: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand both on top of your library or both on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sanctity of poverty is an invention of the rich." —Starke

card.name: Dregs of Sorrow
card.property: Destroy X target nonblack creatures. Draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crovax gazed upon the dead, and for one dark moment he saw a banquet.

card.name: Duplicity
card.property: When Duplicity enters the battlefield, exile the top five cards of your library face down. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile all cards from your hand face down. If you do, put all other cards you own exiled with Duplicity into your hand. At the beginning of your end step, discard a card. When you lose control of Duplicity, put all cards exiled with Duplicity into their owner's graveyard.

card.name: Earthcraft
card.property: Tap an untapped creature you control: Untap target basic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land gives up little, but we are masters of persuasion." —Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Echo Chamber
card.property: {4}, {T}: An opponent chooses target creature he or she controls. Create a token that's a copy of that creature. That token gains haste until end of turn. Exile the token at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Eladamri's Vineyard
card.property: At the beginning of each player's precombat main phase, add {G}{G} to that player's mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mushroom wine made Gerrard's head spin, and his stomach soon followed suit.

card.name: Eladamri, Lord of Leaves
card.property: Other Elf creatures have forestwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.) Other Elves have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have been patient. We have planned our attack. We are ready . . . now." —Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Elite Javelineer
card.property: Whenever Elite Javelineer blocks, it deals 1 damage to target attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Precision is frequently more valuable than force." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Elven Warhounds
card.property: Whenever Elven Warhounds becomes blocked by a creature, put that creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If a creature is dumb enough to love you for leashing it, why would you want to follow its lead?" —Mirri of the Weatherlight

card.name: Elvish Fury
card.property: Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Emerald Medallion
card.property: Green spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Emmessi Tome
card.property: {5}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is like life and destiny: we think we know the story, but we have read only half the tale.

card.name: Endless Scream
card.property: Enchant creature Endless Scream enters the battlefield with X scream counters on it. Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each scream counter on Endless Scream.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have made Crovax weep; now I will make him scream. The pain will not end, but will bind him to me." —Volrath

card.name: Energizer
card.property: {2}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Energizer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a kettle set to boil, it must eventually go off—on someone.

card.name: Enfeeblement
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crovax had witnessed Selenia lead the Predator to the Weatherlight. As the battle raged on deck, he felt his strength melt in the heat of her betrayal.

card.name: Enraging Licid
card.property: {R}, {T}: Enraging Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {R} to end this effect. Enchanted creature has haste.

card.property: X can't be 0. Target spell's controller exiles it with X delay counters on it. At the beginning of each of that player's upkeeps, if that card is exiled, remove a delay counter from it. If the card has no delay counters on it, he or she puts it onto the stack as a copy of the original spell.

card.name: Escaped Shapeshifter
card.property: As long as an opponent controls a creature with flying not named Escaped Shapeshifter, Escaped Shapeshifter has flying. The same is true for first strike, trample, and protection from any color.

card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a basic land: Target creature gains landwalk of each of the land types of the sacrificed land until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a land of any of those types.)

card.name: Extinction
card.property: Destroy all creatures of the creature type of your choice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I once had an entire race killed just to listen to the rattling of their dried bones as I waded through them." —Volrath

card.name: Fevered Convulsions

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tell me again why you failed to capture Gerrard, you worthless pile of spine." —Volrath, to Greven

card.name: Field of Souls
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Fighting Drake
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Two things are needed to survive the harsh skies of Rath: a thick hide and a thicker skull.

card.name: Firefly
card.property: Flying {R}: Firefly gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If they don't pinch, they burn. Can't ya eat any of da bugs here?" —Squee, goblin cabin hand

card.name: Fireslinger
card.property: {T}: Fireslinger deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember the moral of the fireslinger fable: with power comes isolation." —Karn, silver golem

property.name: Flavor

card.property: {R}: Flowstone Giant gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the first of these giants woke from the bedrock, he was still sleepy. He yawned and stretched until his legs grew so thin that they snapped like icicles in the sun. —Vec lore

card.name: Flowstone Salamander

card.property: Flying {R}: Flowstone Wyvern gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where I come from, stone stays on the ground." —Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

card.name: Fool's Tome
card.property: {2}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have no cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Squee: "What's that?" Ertai: "It's a magical book." Squee: "Am I smart enough ta use it?" Ertai: "You could say that."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "But why can't I get one?" sniveled Squee. "All da bugs here got wings."

card.name: Fugitive Druid

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the druids are so devoted to their trees, I will carve them coffins from their precious heartwood." —Volrath

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forgive me," Mirri whispered. "I thought you a burden, and you saved my life." Hanna quietly accepted the apology.

card.property: Enchant creature Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's hard to hurt anyone when you're as transparent as your motives." —Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Gerrard's Battle Cry
card.property: {2} {W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gerrard grinned and drew his sword. "This won't be a fair fight," he called to his crew. "They should have brought a second ship!"

card.name: Ghost Town

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The air here smells like a grave." —Crovax

card.property: {U}: Giant Crab gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: During the giant crabs' mating season, Skyshroud nights are filled with the clatter of their skirmishes.

card.name: Giant Strength
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Crovax seems filled only with shadows," thought Orim. "Where does his strength come from?"

card.name: Goblin Bombardment
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One mogg to aim the catapult, one mogg to steer the rock.

card.name: Gravedigger
card.property: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.

card.name: Grindstone
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. If both cards share a color, repeat this process.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Memory is a burden that wears at the soul as weather wears at stone." —Crovax

card.name: Hand to Hand
card.property: During combat, players can't cast instant spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The match between Tahngarth and Greven was close only in the mind of the minotaur.

card.name: Hanna's Custody
card.property: All artifacts have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I protect the Legacy with my life if necessary, for its purpose is far more important than my own." —Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Harrow
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Harrow, sacrifice a land. Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Changing Rath's landscape is like tearing the scab from a wound.

card.name: Havoc
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a white spell, he or she loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Orim put the lightning rod into place on the bow, she cast a spell of protection to shield herself from the heat. That's when the Furnace got personal.

card.name: Heart Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gerrard looked all around for the source of the mysterious pulse, and at that moment the slivers boiled forth from the crevasses.

card.name: Heartwood Dryad
card.property: Heartwood Dryad can block creatures with shadow as though Heartwood Dryad had shadow.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To snare what lies between worlds takes the patient reach of trees.

card.name: Heartwood Giant
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Heartwood Giant deals 2 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wind in the trees is soothing, but the same can't be said for trees on the wind.

card.name: Heartwood Treefolk
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In all my years in Llanowar I never understood where trees fit in. They are revered by elves and watered on by dogs." —Mirri of the Weatherlight

card.name: Helm of Possession
card.property: You may choose not to untap Helm of Possession during your untap step. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Gain control of target creature for as long as you control Helm of Possession and Helm of Possession remains tapped.

card.name: Hero's Resolve
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+5.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Destiny, chance, fate, fortune—they're all just ways of claiming your successes without claiming your failures." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Horned Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A bristling wave of slivers broke against the Weatherlight's timbers.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So like men are they: a hardened shell with fragile flesh beneath." —Selenia, dark angel

card.name: Humility
card.property: All creatures lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 1/1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One cannot cleanse the wounds of failure." —Karn, silver golem

card.name: Imps' Taunt
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Target creature attacks this turn if able.

card.name: Insight
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a green spell, you draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We can fight with you or against you. After my day, I'd prefer the former." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Interdict
card.property: Counter target activated ability from an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land. That permanent's activated abilities can't be activated this turn. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.) Draw a card.

card.name: Intuition
card.property: Search your library for three cards and reveal them. Target opponent chooses one. Put that card into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Invulnerability
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Jackal Pup
card.property: Whenever Jackal Pup is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first morning after acquiring her familiar, the wizard awoke with fleabites and mange.

card.name: Jet Medallion
card.property: Black spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Jinxed Idol
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, Jinxed Idol deals 2 damage to you. Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent gains control of Jinxed Idol.

card.name: Kezzerdrix
card.property: First strike At the beginning of your upkeep, if your opponents control no creatures, Kezzerdrix deals 4 damage to you.

card.name: Kindle
card.property: Kindle deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Kindle in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hope of deliverance is scorched by the fire of futility.

card.name: Knight of Dawn
card.property: First strike {W}{W}: Knight of Dawn gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Flash like daybreak to the fray. —Motto of the Knights of Dawn

card.name: Knight of Dusk
card.property: {B} {B}: Destroy target creature blocking Knight of Dusk.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fall like night upon the foe. —Motto of the Knights of Dusk

card.name: Krakilin
card.property: Krakilin enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{G}: Regenerate Krakilin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A perfect reflection of its world: brutal, fetal, and lacking truth." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Leeching Licid
card.property: {B}, {T}: Leeching Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {B} to end this effect. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Leeching Licid deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Legacy's Allure
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a treasure counter on Legacy's Allure. Sacrifice Legacy's Allure: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of treasure counters on Legacy's Allure. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Legerdemain
card.property: Exchange control of target artifact or creature and another target permanent that shares one of those types with it. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Squee tucked the warm ball in his pocket and slipped a pebble in its place. 'Glok,' he mumbled, and hid.

card.name: Light of Day
card.property: Black creatures can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not miss sunlight. The very memory of it burns my eyes." —Volrath

card.name: Lightning Blast
card.property: Lightning Blast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who fear the darkness have never seen what the light can do." —Selenia, dark angel

card.name: Lightning Elemental
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A lightning elemental once killed an entire tribe of merfolk—simply by going for a swim.

card.name: Living Death
card.property: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

card.name: Lobotomy
card.property: Target player reveals his or her hand, then you choose a card other than a basic land card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as the chosen card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Lotus Petal
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hard to imagine," mused Hanna, stroking the petal, "such a lovely flower inspiring such greed."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Faugh!" snorted Tahngarth. "Why would it make a meal of something like you?" Squee looked relieved. "No," he continued, "you'd make a much better toothpick."

card.name: Maddening Imp
card.property: Flying {T}: Non-Wall creatures the active player controls attack this turn if able. At the beginning of the next end step, destroy each of those creatures that didn't attack this turn. Activate this ability only during an opponent's turn and only before combat.

card.name: Magmasaur
card.property: Magmasaur enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a +1/+1 counter from Magmasaur. If you don't, sacrifice Magmasaur and it deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to each creature without flying and each player.

card.name: Magnetic Web
card.property: If a creature with a magnet counter on it attacks, all creatures with magnet counters on them attack if able. Whenever a creature with a magnet counter on it attacks, all creatures with magnet counters on them block that creature this turn if able. {1}, {T}: Put a magnet counter on target creature.

card.name: Mana Severance
card.property: Search your library for any number of land cards and exile them. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And when this land is wasted, where will we go?" —Thalakos lament

card.name: Manakin
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hanna regarded Squee sternly. "Because it's not a toy, no matter how much it may look like one," she said, taking the manakin from him.

card.name: Manta Riders
card.property: {U}: Manta Riders gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Water is firmament to the finned." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Marble Titan
card.property: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Strapping on nine hundred pounds of armor every morning would make any warrior cross." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Marsh Lurker
card.property: Sacrifice a Swamp: Marsh Lurker gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the mists it rises, into the mists it retreats; through the mists it walks, fearless and unseen.

card.name: Master Decoy
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Mawcor
card.property: Flying {T}: Mawcor deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From its maw comes neither word nor whisper—only wind.

card.name: Maze of Shadows
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Untap target attacking creature with shadow. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

card.name: Meditate
card.property: Draw four cards. You skip your next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Part of me believes that Barrin taught me meditation simply to shut me up." —Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the clever counterfeit was accepted by the hive, Volrath's influence upon the slivers grew even stronger.

card.name: Mindwhip Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: Target player discards a card at random. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They share more than their thoughts. We must shatter their link quickly!" —Hanna, to Orim

card.name: Minion of the Wastes
card.property: Trample As Minion of the Wastes enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life. Minion of the Wastes's power and toughness are each equal to the life paid as it entered the battlefield.

card.name: Mirri's Guile
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hanna was astounded. Mirri read every leaf and wisp of breeze like a book of ancient lore.

card.name: Mnemonic Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: Draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A jigsaw puzzle that lives, breeds, and thinks." —Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Mogg Cannon
card.property: {T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains flying until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Moggs never volunteer for anything twice.

card.name: Mogg Conscripts
card.property: Mogg Conscripts can't attack unless you've cast a creature spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Torahn's horns! They've seen us. Now, statue, you must fight to save yourself!" —Tahngarth, aboard the Predator

card.name: Mogg Fanatic
card.property: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I got it! I got it! I—"

card.name: Mogg Hollows
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Mogg Hollows doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Mogg Raider
card.property: Sacrifice a Goblin: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The evisceration of one mogg always cheers up the rest.

card.name: Mogg Squad
card.property: Mogg Squad gets -1/-1 for each other creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As they crept into the Weatherlight's hold, the squad leader held up his hand and whispered, "Stop, goblins—what's that sound?"

card.name: Mongrel Pack
card.property: When Mongrel Pack dies during combat, create four 1/1 green Hound creature tokens.

card.name: Mountain
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Mountain
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Mountain
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Mountain
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Mounted Archers
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) {W}: Mounted Archers can block an additional creature this turn.

card.name: Muscle Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The air was filled with the cracks and snaps of flesh hardening as the new sliver joined the battle.

card.name: Natural Spring
card.property: Target player gains 8 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirri listened intently, even as Hanna held the healing water to her lips. Would the sound of the spring drown out the elves' approach?

card.name: Nature's Revolt
card.property: All lands are 2/2 creatures that are still lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One day the land will don the semblance of flesh and challenge even the plowshare's blade." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Needle Storm
card.property: Needle Storm deals 4 damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rain is driven like nails.

card.name: No Quarter
card.property: Whenever a creature becomes blocked by a creature with lesser power, destroy the blocking creature. Whenever a creature blocks a creature with lesser power, destroy the attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Gerrard and Greven neared each other, the moggs caught between them realized they should flee.

card.name: Nurturing Licid
card.property: {G}, {T}: Nurturing Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {G} to end this effect. {G}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

card.name: Opportunist
card.property: {T}: Opportunist deals 1 damage to target creature that was dealt damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The third time the Oracle glanced suspiciously at him, Starke decided she had glanced twice too often.

card.name: Oracle en-Vec
card.property: {T}: Target opponent chooses any number of creatures he or she controls. During that player's next turn, the chosen creatures attack if able, and other creatures can't attack. At the beginning of that turn's end step, destroy each of the chosen creatures that didn't attack this turn. Activate this ability only during your turn.

card.name: Orim's Prayer
card.property: Whenever one or more creatures attack you, you gain 1 life for each attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As usual, there will be time for prayer only after the worst happens." —Orim, Samite healer

card.name: Orim, Samite Healer
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The silkworm spins itself a new existence. So the healer weaves the threads of life." —Orim, Samite healer

card.name: Overrun
card.property: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You want to know your enemy? Look at your feet while you trample him." —Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

card.name: Pacifism
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Frozen by conscience, Karn did not resist as the moggs carried him to the Predator.

card.name: Pallimud
card.property: As Pallimud enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. Pallimud's power is equal to the number of tapped lands the chosen player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The old Vec tell tales of a beast that fed on scraps but turned its nose up at the lavish banquet they set in its honor.

card.name: Patchwork Gnomes
card.property: Discard a card: Regenerate Patchwork Gnomes.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just when I get them working, they always start fighting and tearing at each other for spare parts." —Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Pearl Medallion
card.property: White spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Pegasus Refuge
card.property: {2}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first Rath-born pegasus was so offended by the sky that it hid its eyes in the earth. —Vec lore

card.name: Perish
card.property: Destroy all green creatures. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There will come a time when the voices of soil and seedling will sing only laments." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Phyrexian Grimoire
card.property: {4}, {T}: Target opponent chooses one of the top two cards of your graveyard. Exile that card and put the other one into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every page cost a life; every secret cost a thousand more.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are convenient in having no souls, but less so in having no spirit." —Volrath

card.name: Phyrexian Splicer
card.property: {2}, {T}, Choose flying, first strike, trample, or shadow: Until end of turn, target creature with the chosen ability loses it and another target creature gains it.

card.name: Pincher Beetles
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No fair! Since when does a bug get ta munch on me?" —Squee, goblin cabin hand

card.name: Pine Barrens
card.property: Pine Barrens enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool. Pine Barrens deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Pit Imp
card.property: Flying {B}: Pit Imp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The moans of the Death Pits were underscored by the chattering of imps, for whom the ship was cause for much discussion.

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Power Sink
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If he or she doesn't, that player taps all lands with mana abilities he or she controls and empties his or her mana pool.

card.name: Precognition
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of target opponent's library. If you do, you may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A gleam like struggling sunlight penetrated Selenia's dark thoughts.

card.name: Propaganda
card.property: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature he or she controls that's attacking you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You've failed Gerrard. You've failed the Legacy. You've failed yourself. I can do no more." —Volrath, to Karn

card.name: Puppet Strings
card.property: {2}, {T}: You may tap or untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have no illusions," Volrath warned Greven, "about free will."

card.name: Quickening Licid
Rain of Tears
card.property: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These rains cannot quench; they carve the land's face like a scalpel on flesh." —Crovax

card.name: Rampant Growth
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rath forces plants from its surface as one presses whey from cheese.

card.name: Ranger en-Vec
card.property: First strike {G}: Regenerate Ranger en-Vec.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The path of least resistance will seldom lead you beyond your doorstep." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Rathi Dragon
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Rathi Dragon enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice two Mountains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wrap the flame as twine Kingdoms will be thine.

card.name: Rats of Rath
card.property: {B}: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These creatures offer new challenges in the scrutiny of entrails." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Reality Anchor
card.property: Target creature loses shadow until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "See how you like it." —Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Reanimate
card.property: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Reap
card.property: Return up to X target cards from your graveyard to your hand, where X is the number of black permanents target opponent controls as you cast Reap.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let Volrath choke on his crop of hatred." —Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Reckless Spite
card.property: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My plan's elegance leads my enemies to believe it is spite that fuels me." —Volrath

card.name: Recycle
card.property: Skip your draw step. Whenever you play a card, draw a card. Your maximum hand size is two.

card.name: Reflecting Pool
card.property: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any type that a land you control could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The reflection of land interests me far more than its reality." —Volrath

card.name: Renegade Warlord
card.property: First strike Whenever Renegade Warlord attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "His tongue must be honey, the way he gathers ants to fight with him." —Volrath

card.name: Repentance
card.property: Target creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The cannon wasn't aimed at you!" pleaded Vhati. "I'm not sure which is more pathetic," replied Greven, "your judgment or your aim."

card.name: Respite
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. You gain 1 life for each attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If they board us we're finished," warned Orim. Crovax nodded. "And if they don't . . . what then?"

card.name: Rolling Thunder
card.property: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such rage," thought Vhati, gazing up at the thunderhead from the Predator. "It is Greven's mind manifest."

card.name: Root Maze
card.property: Artifacts and lands enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We should step up repairs. I think the forest has plans for us." —Crovax

card.name: Rootbreaker Wurm
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Gerrard made his escape, the wurm covered his flight by helping itself to three great mouthfuls of merfolk.

card.name: Rootwalla
card.property: {1} {G}: Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you try to sneak up on a rootwalla, you'll suddenly find yourself dealing with twice the lizard.

card.name: Rootwater Depths
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Rootwater Depths doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Rootwater Diver
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Rootwater Diver: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Drop a dagger into the murky deep and the merfolk will cut your throat with it." —Skyshroud saying

card.name: Rootwater Hunter
card.property: {T}: Rootwater Hunter deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bitter water vicious wave Shadow-cold shallows root-made maze Home's angry embrace." —Rootwater Saga

card.name: Rootwater Matriarch
card.property: {T}: Gain control of target creature for as long as that creature is enchanted.

card.name: Rootwater Shaman
card.property: You may cast Aura spells with enchant creature as though they had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ugh! When did orcs and fish start having kids?" —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Ruby Medallion
card.property: Red spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Sacred Guide
card.property: {1} {W}, Sacrifice Sacred Guide: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a white card. Put that card into your hand and exile all other cards revealed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm amused by wasted effort when it's not my own." —Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I used to describe something stable as 'rock solid.' So much for that expression." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.value: "This has nothing to do with what you know and everything to do with what I wish." —Volrath

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire cleanses as well as destroys; that is the nature of change." —Oracle en-Vec

card.property: Scragnoth can't be countered. Protection from blue

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It possesses no intelligence, only counter-intelligence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are called 'fowl' for a reason." —Mirri of the Weatherlight

card.name: Scroll Rack
card.property: {1}, {T}: Exile any number of cards from your hand face down. Put that many cards from the top of your library into your hand. Then look at the exiled cards and put them on top of your library in any order.

card.property: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Water is life. Or perhaps it is just something to wash it down with.

card.property: {T}: Untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We shun them not for their dream but for their refusal to let such a noble dream die a noble death." —Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Segmented Wurm
card.property: Whenever Segmented Wurm becomes the target of a spell or ability, put a -1/-1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If only we could so easily leave behind those parts of ourselves that pain us." —Crovax

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am light. I am dark. I must give my life to serve; not even death can release me." —Selenia, dark angel

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A sacrifice made in peace is worth a dozen made in panic." —Orim, Samite healer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Volrath is a harsh master. My reflection is a constant reminder of that." —Greven il-Vec

property.value: "You've not seen a storm until you've seen the kind that roars between worlds." —Lyna, Soltari emissary

card.property: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such fuss over machines, Gerrard. Remember that you are the prize of the Legacy. Throw away your toys!" —Orim, Samite healer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The brighter the wings, the deeper the impact crater.

property.value: As the horrors closed in on Gerrard, Squee trembled and clutched his toy for comfort. He didn't know where it came from or why it was so warm, but he was glad he'd kept it near.

card.name: Wind Drake
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Orim regarded Gerrard coolly. "You are like the drake," she said, her expression unchanging. "It works hard to maintain its position, but to us it seems to glide along effortlessly. You must do the same."
